DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , double-blind , active-controlled , parallel , multicenter Phase 3 study Tramadol hydrochloride/Acetaminophen SR Tab . & Tramadol hydrochloride/Acetaminophen Tab . Acute Toothache Patients Moderate Pain Teeth Extraction Surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 3 Study Tramadol Hydrochloride/Acetaminophen SR Tab . & Tramadol Hydrochloride/Acetaminophen Tab . Acute Toothache Patients After Teeth Extraction Surgery
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult males/Females age 20 year 2 . Patients 2 impacted wisdom teeth upper low jaw 3 . Pain VAS Value 50 mm evaluate 100mm VAS 4 . Subjects voluntarily legal guardian agree write consent 1 . Patients severe heart disease , uncontrol hypertension , diabetes 2 . Patients take long period NSAID ( eg . celecoxib , rofecoxib naproxen etc ) within 3 day screen point 3 . Patients take shorttime anesthetic drug analgesic within 12 hour screen point ( except shorttime anesthetic surgery ) 4 . Patients aspirin asthma ( asthma seizure cause NSAIDs ) medical history 5 . Patients severe respiratory depression
